sections.name: Discovery
sections.description: Kickstart learning with fundamental tech skills

sections.name: Delivery
sections.description: Build an end-to-end project that solves a problem

sections.name: Disciplines
sections.description: Develop deeper expertise in a tech discipline

navSections.name: Discovery
navSections.description: Gain insight into the landscape of the modern tech industry and ability to apply key professional development & communication skills
navSections.further: The Core Modules are the heart & soul of this new programme. The topic areas have been defined as a result of extensive research & consultation with industry leaders, existing clients & our very own associates to identify the primary blockers for new hires into the technology industry across a wide variety of roles.

navSections.name: Delivery
navSections.description: Gain essential understanding of & ability to apply key techniques to an end-to-end project delivery.

navSections.name: Disciplines
navSections.description: Gain deeper understanding & ability to apply further techniques that are particularly desirable within the area of assigned discipline
navSections.further: Trainers use insights from the Foundation & Discovery sections to identify each student's areas of particular strength and create discipline ‘pods’. Each pod work separately on selected modules to enhance their insight into key aspects of that discipline area before coming back together to share & apply their skills in a multi-disciplinary project.

navSections.name: Launch
navSections.description: Gain understanding of interdisciplinary communication & collaboration and combine skills into a long-form multidisciplinary project

navSections.name: Associate
navSections.description: Continue technical and professional development throughout immersive placement.
navSections.note: NB: Below is a small sample of associate modules available.
